oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clarksville-Montgomery County Consolidated Government Charter Commission: Utilities Subcommittee Reports, 1980
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Utilities Subcommittee Final Report called for the formation of The Consolidated Government Utilities Board. Under consolidation, the board would create a Gas, Water, and Sanitary Sewer System which would exist as a separate entity within the consolidated government.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Community development; Metropolitan government; Municipal charters; Public utilities--Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: 1980 Charter Commission
